name: Costa Rica Tarrazu
recipe: To make a delicious cup of Costa Rica Tarrazu coffee, start by grinding 2 tablespoons of beans to a medium grind. Place the grounds into a coffee filter in your drip coffee maker. Add 6 cups of water to the water reservoir and turn on the machine. Once the coffee is brewed, pour it into your favorite mug and enjoy!

name: Jamaican Blue Mountain
recipe: To make a delicious cup of Jamaican Blue Mountain coffee, start by grinding 2 tablespoons of beans to a light grind. Place the grounds into a coffee filter in your drip coffee maker. Add 6 cups of water to the water reservoir and turn on the machine. Once the coffee is brewed, pour it into your favorite mug and enjoy!
